title: 关于1.3单人指令使用不能
author: 布子
txt_content:
今天中午找到了个单人指令的论坛下载 传送门:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 5%C8%CB%D6%B8%C1%EE
可是我按照上面的做了把worldedit放在bin下    其余扔进minecraft   发现使用不能


顺便求一下加速MOD 谢谢..

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
唉... 算了

簡單說, 說是用解壓縮軟件打開 minecraft.jar
刪除裡頭的 META-INF 文件夾
把MOD壓縮檔內的所有".class"文件全放入 minecraft.jar 內
然後把"WorldEdit.jar"文件放入 .minecraft/bin 文件夾中

patch.properties 以及 readme.txt 不用放入

replies.author: 布子
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-6-24 13:44 
最新的都1.66了- -
我用1.5的电脑 都会卡机- -    1.6不敢试啊

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-6-24 17:25 编辑 

1. Go to the minecraft bin directory and backup minecraft.jar
2. Using 7zip or equally capable ZIP viewer open minecraft.jar
3. Delete the META-INF folder
4. Copy ALL the ".class" files contained within the mod to minecraft.jar, replacing the existing files.
5. Close minecraft.jar
6. Copy ALL the ".jar" files contained within the mod to the minecraft/bin directory (the same directory as minecraft.jar)

不會是忘了刪 META-INF 吧...

另外... 加速... 單人指令好像就有吧...
setspeed [SPEED|reset] - Sets the speed that the player moves
